legacy_description: Legacy Crafty Syntax auto-invite rules. Controlled when a visitor would be auto-invited into chat based on page, visits, referrer, seconds on page, and operator availability.

legacy_columns.department: Department ID (not always used correctly in legacy)
legacy_columns.socialpane: Y/N flag for showing social pane
legacy_columns.excludemobile: Y/N flag to exclude mobile devices
legacy_columns.onlymobile: Y/N flag to target only mobile devices

migration_notes: Boolean Y/N fields converted to integer 1/0.
Legacy table had no timestamps; new table uses bigint ymdhis.
Department field was inconsistently used in legacy but preserved for historical accuracy.
Table is preserved as part of Crafty Syntax subsystem inside Lupopedia.
